links.*: Tolkien and the Study of His Sources

wikitext.*:
'''Josh B. Long''' completed his M.A. thesis on ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'' at the [[Wikipedia:California State Polytechnic University, Pomona|California State Polytechnic University, Pomona]] in 2006.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://books.google.com/books/about/Anti_tract_and_Counterblast.html?id=Y3eVtgAACAAJ&redir_esc=y|articlename="Anti-tract and "Counterblast"|dated=|website=[http://books.google.com/ Books.Google.com]|accessed=18 May 2013}}</ref> He has worked as a research assistant on ''[[The Company They Keep]]''.<ref>[[Mythlore 121/122|''Mythlore'' 121/122]], p. 46 ("About the Author")</ref>
